name: .MER
summary: Learn about .MER files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a MER file in Rockwell Automation RSView (Windows). Note that RSView has been discontinued.

In versions 6 and above of RSView, you can specify that you want to allow RSView to convert a compiled MER file back into a MED file for further editing. If the developer who created your MER file selected this option, you can use RSView to convert your MER file to a MED file.
